Black Asian Native 49.6% 30.9% 6.2% 0.4% Islander Other Mixed Hispanic (any race) 0.02% 4.7% 8.1% 11.3% Forest Park (formerly Harlem) is a village in Cook County, Illinois, a suburb of Chicago, United States. The population was 14,339 at the 2020 census. The Forest Park terminal on the CTA Blue Line is the line's western terminal, located on the Eisenhower Expressway at Des Plaines Avenue. ==References== Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois
